summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for JEGE, Inc. during November 2013. It includes information on deposits, checks paid, and service charges, highlighting the financial activities of the account.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as the contact person for inquiries regarding the account statement.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, VI 00802
keyFacts: The account balance for JEGE, Inc. as of November 30, 2013, was $303,877.86.
The document details an incoming money transfer of $104,927.86 on November 1, 2013.
A check for $1,050.00 was paid on November 15, 2013.
Service charges included a $50.00 fee for the statement period.
The document is marked as confidential and subject to legal restrictions.
